name: Mohammad Amir
intro: I am a creative, results-driven, customer-focused, highly motivated and analytical Lead Developer.
Experienced in end-to-end application development using modern technologies and frameworks.
careerObjective: To obtain a responsible and challenging position with a progressive organization where I can contribute my knowledge and work experience in application development for mutually beneficial growth relationship between the organization and myself.
profileSummary: Currently working as Lead Software Engineer at LegalHero GmbH, Berlin, Germany.
Having 12+ years of experience in End-to-End Web Application Development using Java/SpringBoot/React and other Javascript based technologies and frameworks.
Good experience of Software Development Life Cycle policies and procedures implementation with Agile Methodologies(SCRUM and KANBAN)

responsibilities: Performance tuning and root cause analysis for system issues.
